State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1937 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the years 1934, 1935 and 1936.

To His Excellency, Governor R. L. Cochran: We respectfully submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write Insurance m this State for the year ending December 81. 1937. DEPARTMENT OP INSURANCE, C. SMRHA, Director.
